summary: Completed comprehensive testing of WhatsApp Multi-Agent Router CRM Phase 1. Backend APIs are fully functional with 100% test success rate. Frontend dashboard works correctly with proper role-based access control. Minor UX issue identified with login redirect flow.

ui_bugs.issue: After successful login, user remains on /login page instead of auto-redirecting to dashboard
ui_bugs.impact: User must manually navigate to dashboard or refresh page
ui_bugs.workaround: User can navigate directly to / after login

passed_tests: Backend API authentication for all roles (SUPERUSER, ADMIN, AGENT)
Users endpoint with proper role restrictions
Frontend login page UI and form elements

items.description: Fix automatic redirect to dashboard after successful login. Currently user stays on /login page despite successful authentication.
items.suggested_fix: Update login success handler in AuthProvider to programmatically navigate to dashboard using React Router
